channel.title: COMPUTE on Ventus Docs
channel.description: Recent content in COMPUTE on Ventus Docs

item.title: Virtual Machines
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of how to create, resize, delete Linux and Windows Virtual Machine, and instructions for other steps to manage Virtual Machines in the Cloud Console. Table of contents Virtual Machines Page Create Linux Virtual Machine Create Windows Virtual Machine Download RDP File Edit a Virtual Machine Resize a Virtual Machine Delete a Virtual Machine Virtual Machine details page Virtual Machines page To get to the Virtual Machines page you need to select the Virtual Machines from the VIRTUAL DATACENTER block in the side-bar menu.

item.title: Connect to Linux VM
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of how to connect to the Linux Virual Machine created in the Cloud Console using SSH Protocol Table of contents

item.title: Connect to Windows VM
item.description: On this page, you can find an explanation of how to connect to the Windows Virtual Machine created in the Cloud Console using Remote Desktop Protocol Table of contents
